Collaboration diagram for Architectures:


Modules

 AVR
 8 Bit RISC processor.
 ARM
 32 Bit RISC processor.
 Emulator (UNIX)
 Running Nut/OS Apps on a UNIX machine.
 H8/300H
 Renesas 16 Bit CPU.
 M68K
 Freescale CISC Processor.

Detailed Description

Target devices.

Only the AVR and ARM platforms can be considered stable. The H8/300 support has come to halt long time ago and support for the M68K did not even start.

The Emulator running on UNIX has been recently updated and should work again.
